channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8611] grant/revoke syntax should support additional objects for authorization plugins
item.description: The authorization framework supports URI and global objects. The SQL syntax however doesn't allow granting privileges on these objects. We should allow the compiler to parse these so that it can be handled by authorization plugins.
item.summary: grant/revoke syntax should support additional objects for authorization plugins

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
